lines.text: Mother, did anyone ever hit you? I mean a real slap that you can hear ring, and you didn't feel a thing?
Yes, my child. There was a time when someone hit me, and I didn't feel a thing.
Then, it is possible for someone to hit you, and not hurt you at all?
Yes, my child. Someone can beat you, and beat you, without hurting you at all.
It would be too convenient if death were the end of everything.
Tonight I will see the good Lord.
Even in Heaven, there's only justice - nothing but justice!
